article_title: Why we’re seeing some severe COVID-19 cases among younger people
article_description: Young people can become seriously ill from the novel coronavirus  even though COVID 19 is deadlier for seniors  Health officials are asking younger adults to take the pandemic seriously
article_content: They can come down with a severe case of the disease caused by the novel coronavirus  but its less likely  Photo by Sergei Bobylev TASS via Getty Images COVID 19  the disease caused by the novel coronavirus  has been much deadlier in older people but more a   3187 chars
